  • Element
org.jacp.api.annotations

Annotation Type Component


  • @Target(value=TYPE)
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface Component
    This annotation defines the meta definition of an JACP UI component.
    Author:
    Andy Moncsek

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      java.lang.String defaultExecutionTarget
      The execution target at start time.
      java.lang.String id
      The component id.
      java.lang.String name
      The components name.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      boolean active
      The active state at start time.
      java.lang.String localeID
      Represents the Locale ID. see: http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/locales-137662.html
      java.lang.String resourceBundleLocation
      Represents the location of your resource bundle file.

    • Element Detail

      • name

        public abstract java.lang.String name
        The components name.
        Returns:
        The component name

      • id

        public abstract java.lang.String id
        The component id.
        Returns:
        The component Id

      • defaultExecutionTarget

        public abstract java.lang.String defaultExecutionTarget
        The execution target at start time.
        Returns:
        The default execution target defined by perspective

      • active

        public abstract boolean active
        The active state at start time.
        Returns:
        True
        Default:
        true

      • resourceBundleLocation

        public abstract java.lang.String resourceBundleLocation
        Represents the location of your resource bundle file.
        Returns:
        The default resource bundle location (like bundle.messages)
        Default:
        ""

      • localeID

        public abstract java.lang.String localeID
        Represents the Locale ID. see: http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/locales-137662.html
        Returns:
        The default locale Id
        Default:
        ""
